content: Mary Kay Letourneau Gets Combative During Rare TV Interview with Vili Fualaau and Their Two Children

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div span a span
content: Television

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div span
content: By TooFab Staff

content: Sunday Night

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div span
content: Scandals of the '90s: Where Are They Now?

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: Letourneau says she "absolutely" believes she was wrongly imprisoned for having sex with a 12-year-old.

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: Mary Kay Letourneau, husband Vili Fualaau and the controversial couple's two children appeared in a new television interview that got pretty heated as the reporter grilled the former teacher on the couple's illegal relationship.

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: Appearing on Australia's "Sunday Night" show, Mary Kay and Vili were joined by their now grown daughters Audrey, 21, and Georgia, 19, who got candid about the media scrutiny on their family and what it was like growing up in the shadow of scandal.

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span span
content: Audrey and Georgia Fualaau/Sunday Night

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: "I think I understand about it, just like how it was surprising to people," Audrey said when asked about her parents' relationship. "It's been feeling different because it's not really been brought to our attention, just because we grew up with it, so we're adapted to it."

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: "He definitely feels like a young dad now that I'm at that adult age to where I'm like, I can go to the bar," she added, saying Vili is more "like a friend dad."

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: Audrey, who was born while Mary Kay was behind bars, didn't say much, except to say that her mom "literally cut the padding out of my bra once." Defending her actions, Letourneau said, "It's unnecessary and it's unnatural on so many levels."

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div div div div div a h4 span
content: Vili Fualaau Opens Up About Marriage to Mary Kay Letourneau: You Have Your Ups and Downs

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div div div div div a span
content: View Story

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: Letourneau added that, growing up, she'd tell her two daughters every day, "I love you, now go and do the right thing."

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: But when asked by reporter Matt Doran whether she did the right thing looking back at her relationship with Vili -- which began when she was 34 and he was 12 -- she got combative. "You know what, I'm not going to continue with you trying to have me answer that question," she told him. "I did my best every single day and I live that way and I did. And in that situation, it doesn't even matter."

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: There were quite a few tense exchanges like that throughout the 30-minute special, including one conversation even Fualaau said was "ridiculous" and "weird."

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: In an odd moment between Doran, Letourneau and Fualaau (

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p em span
content: around the 9:50 mark in the video above

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: ), the reporter asked about her children with ex-husband Steve Letourneau, to whom she was married when she began her underage affair. "That's why I asked him to get away from us," she said of Fualaau. "Go and do your thing."

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: When Doran said it seemed like she was saying the 12-year-old was "relentlessly pursuing" her, but she was the adult, Letourneau responded, "You can say that. I was by age. You don't know him."

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: "I don't need to know him in this discussion, he's the child," Doran shot back. Letourneau then repeatedly asked her husband, "Who was the boss? Who was the boss? Who was the boss back then?" At this point, Fualaau said "this is ridiculous" and "this is getting weird," as she kept asking the same question. Eventually, he relented, saying, "I was the pursuer."

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: "Mary, even as you're hearing this now, come on, he was 13," Doran then said. When she responded by saying, "It doesn't matter," the reporter replied, "It absolutely matters!"

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: "Flaw me," Letourneau said, "I did the best I could. Flaw me. Character flaw. Ooh." She also later took issue with Doran characterizing Fualaau as "a little boy" in the '90s.

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div div div div div a h4 span
content: 7 Wild Updates from Mary Kay Letourneau and Vili Fualaau's 'Autobiography' Special

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div div div div div a span
content: View Story

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: Throughout the interview, Mary Kay continued to deny knowing "there was a specific law" saying their relationship was illegal at the time. "I did not know, I have said this over and over again," she claimed.

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: She added that she "absolutely" believes she was "wrongly imprisoned."

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: "It's just absurd to think that 13-year-olds aren't having sex and they're not pursuing it in a very deliberate, knowing way," she said. "It's absurd."

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: Doran called her out on that one too, saying it's not relevant because of her own age at the time.

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: "There are cases where there could be abuse, so you have to have a law that acts as a deterrent," Mary added. "There are people who might pursue and abuse a situation."

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div div div div div a h4 span
content: Mary Jo Buttafuoco Admits She 'Made a Lot of Mistakes' 25 Years After Amy Fisher Scandal on 'Snapped'

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div div div div div a span
content: View Story

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: In a solo interview, Fualaau said that what she did was legally "wrong," and added that they "maybe should have waited" to have a physical relationship. "I think about it, could I have ever done that, could I have ever been with a girl that's 13 years old right now and I don't see myself doing it," the now-35-year-old said.

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: Speaking by himself, Fualaau also admitted to thinking about separation. "Every now and then, I don't want to talk about that," he added.

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: When Doran asked if he had any advice for his 13-year-old self, Fualaau said with a laugh, "Don't do it!" However, he then went on to say he regrets nothing because of his two children.

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: "Anything that's already happened is already meant to be. it's my journey in life, so I gotta live it out," he added.

content: Mary Kay Letourneau Gets Combative During Rare TV Interview with Vili Fualaau and Their Two Children

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div span a span
content: Television

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div span
content: By TooFab Staff

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div span
html body div div div div div main article div div span time span
content: September 24, 2018 12:26 PM

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div div span a span
content: View Photos

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div div span
content: Sunday Night

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div span
content: Scandals of the '90s: Where Are They Now?

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: Letourneau says she "absolutely" believes she was wrongly imprisoned for having sex with a 12-year-old.

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: Mary Kay Letourneau, husband Vili Fualaau and the controversial couple's two children appeared in a new television interview that got pretty heated as the reporter grilled the former teacher on the couple's illegal relationship.

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: Appearing on Australia's "Sunday Night" show, Mary Kay and Vili were joined by their now grown daughters Audrey, 21, and Georgia, 19, who got candid about the media scrutiny on their family and what it was like growing up in the shadow of scandal.

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span span
content: Audrey and Georgia Fualaau/Sunday Night

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: "I think I understand about it, just like how it was surprising to people," Audrey said when asked about her parents' relationship. "It's been feeling different because it's not really been brought to our attention, just because we grew up with it, so we're adapted to it."

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: "He definitely feels like a young dad now that I'm at that adult age to where I'm like, I can go to the bar," she added, saying Vili is more "like a friend dad."

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: Audrey, who was born while Mary Kay was behind bars, didn't say much, except to say that her mom "literally cut the padding out of my bra once." Defending her actions, Letourneau said, "It's unnecessary and it's unnatural on so many levels."

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div div div div div a h4 span
content: Vili Fualaau Opens Up About Marriage to Mary Kay Letourneau: You Have Your Ups and Downs

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div div div div div a span
content: View Story

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: Letourneau added that, growing up, she'd tell her two daughters every day, "I love you, now go and do the right thing."

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: But when asked by reporter Matt Doran whether she did the right thing looking back at her relationship with Vili -- which began when she was 34 and he was 12 -- she got combative. "You know what, I'm not going to continue with you trying to have me answer that question," she told him. "I did my best every single day and I live that way and I did. And in that situation, it doesn't even matter."

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: There were quite a few tense exchanges like that throughout the 30-minute special, including one conversation even Fualaau said was "ridiculous" and "weird."

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: In an odd moment between Doran, Letourneau and Fualaau (

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p em span
content: around the 9:50 mark in the video above

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: ), the reporter asked about her children with ex-husband Steve Letourneau, to whom she was married when she began her underage affair. "That's why I asked him to get away from us," she said of Fualaau. "Go and do your thing."

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: When Doran said it seemed like she was saying the 12-year-old was "relentlessly pursuing" her, but she was the adult, Letourneau responded, "You can say that. I was by age. You don't know him."

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: "I don't need to know him in this discussion, he's the child," Doran shot back. Letourneau then repeatedly asked her husband, "Who was the boss? Who was the boss? Who was the boss back then?" At this point, Fualaau said "this is ridiculous" and "this is getting weird," as she kept asking the same question. Eventually, he relented, saying, "I was the pursuer."

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: "Mary, even as you're hearing this now, come on, he was 13," Doran then said. When she responded by saying, "It doesn't matter," the reporter replied, "It absolutely matters!"

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: "Flaw me," Letourneau said, "I did the best I could. Flaw me. Character flaw. Ooh." She also later took issue with Doran characterizing Fualaau as "a little boy" in the '90s.

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div div div div div a h4 span
content: 7 Wild Updates from Mary Kay Letourneau and Vili Fualaau's 'Autobiography' Special

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div div div div div a span
content: View Story

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: Throughout the interview, Mary Kay continued to deny knowing "there was a specific law" saying their relationship was illegal at the time. "I did not know, I have said this over and over again," she claimed.

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: She added that she "absolutely" believes she was "wrongly imprisoned."

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: "It's just absurd to think that 13-year-olds aren't having sex and they're not pursuing it in a very deliberate, knowing way," she said. "It's absurd."

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: Doran called her out on that one too, saying it's not relevant because of her own age at the time.

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: "There are cases where there could be abuse, so you have to have a law that acts as a deterrent," Mary added. "There are people who might pursue and abuse a situation."

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div div div div div a h4 span
content: Mary Jo Buttafuoco Admits She 'Made a Lot of Mistakes' 25 Years After Amy Fisher Scandal on 'Snapped'

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div div div div div a span
content: View Story

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: In a solo interview, Fualaau said that what she did was legally "wrong," and added that they "maybe should have waited" to have a physical relationship. "I think about it, could I have ever done that, could I have ever been with a girl that's 13 years old right now and I don't see myself doing it," the now-35-year-old said.

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: Speaking by himself, Fualaau also admitted to thinking about separation. "Every now and then, I don't want to talk about that," he added.

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: When Doran asked if he had any advice for his 13-year-old self, Fualaau said with a laugh, "Don't do it!" However, he then went on to say he regrets nothing because of his two children.

tag: html body div div div div div main article div div div p span
content: "Anything that's already happened is already meant to be. it's my journey in life, so I gotta live it out," he added.
